To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AugenPriceSpike _aps;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_aps = APS(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_aps.IsReady)
{
    var current = _aps.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.aps = self.APS(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.aps.IsReady:
    current = self.aps.Current.Value
